name: The Sims 4 Star Wars™: Journey to Batuu
name_original: The Sims 4 Star Wars™: Journey to Batuu
description: Create your Sim's unique Star Wars™ story as you explore Batuu. Create your Sim's unique Star Wars™ story as you explore the remote world of Batuu, from Galaxy's Edge at Disneyland® and Disney World®, in The Sims™ 4 Star Wars™: Journey to Batuu Game Pack*.
